name: You Shoot, I’ll Drive
description:
You Shoot, I'll Drive is a 3D action local co-op game set in a dystopian world, where the players team up to escape the city in a modded car while battling hordes of enemy vehicles.

This game was made as part of the Rapid Prototyping Development course at the Centre for Entertainment Arts.

Controls

Player 1 (First Person Shooter): Use Mouse to look around. Press Left Mouse Button to fireyour machine gun. Find and direct the driver to the shining beam objective at the end of the level.

Player 2 (Top-Down Driver): Use WASD or Arrow Keys to drive and Space Bar to brake. Navigate to the exit, collect ammo and health pick-ups while avoiding enemies and environmental obstacles.
